summary: The module defines a collection of lightweight Lightning model and data module subclasses along with numerous test functions that exercise hyperparameter collection, saving, loading, and serialization in various forms (dataclass, dict, namespace, OmegaConf, pickle, YAML, fsspec). It validates that hyperparameters are correctly captured, persisted, and restored across different initialization patterns and edge cases.
business_intent: Provide comprehensive unit tests to guarantee reliable hyperparameter management for PyTorch Lightning models and data modules, ensuring correct behavior in configuration handling, persistence, and compatibility with diverse serialization mechanisms.
